name: ɯ̶̏͊ʎ̬̤̯̜̓ͧ̽ṣ̜̣̲̩̥ͩ͋̓̚͡ʇ͚̞̼̓͆̾̔ı̏ͯͫ͗͗ͭ͗͘ן̯̝̭̲͇ͪͭ̍̄̌ǝ͊ͧ
description:
Arrow keys to Move; C to Confirm, X to Cancel. R to Reset. F4 to Quit.

A stream of bits from an unknown source were recorded by an enthusiast radio operator living on the edge of Grand Junction, Colorado. They were discovered to correspond to Assembly code commands for an 8-bit 6502 CPU. This game is a recreation of the contents in the specifications of the Nintendo Entertainment System, part of an ongoing initiative to search for someone who can properly grasp the interplay of the systems before the program refuses input.

Made for Train Jam 2017 by Hangedman. (Theme: Unexpected/Anticipation).
http://hangedmandesign.com
